resources.string:
BatCon will notify you when the battery reaches the selected threshold by playing the selected notification sound (set to your phone's ringtone by default) 

 BatCon only starts monitoring your battery after you connect your device to power, it is necessary for BatCon's service to be already running before connecting the device to power or else it won't monitor your battery 

 NOTE: It is recommended that you turn off battery optimizations for BatCon
You will be notified when your battery reaches %d%%
